author: VincentX

comments.content:
It appears to be Avant Garde, with the alt “e” seen here:

[http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner\_flake/avant\_garde\_gothic\_...](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012145327/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner_flake/avant_garde_gothic_alternate_ot/ "http://www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/elsner\_flake/avant\_garde\_gothic\_alternate\_ot/")

and a customized “c.”

I think it’s actually Century Gothic with a rotated ’e’.

- Lex

That’s exactly it, Lex.

Thanks guys! Much appreciated.

Well played, Lex. Damn those MS pseudo-substitute fonts!

(Actually, I like Century Gothic’s awkwardness.)
